author: michaelo
msg: Remove explicit breadcrumbs from IT site.xml files. They all lead to dead pages (404). Let rather the inheritance magic work.

author: michaelo
msg: Revert to title case as per most UI design guidelines.

author: jkaluza
msg: Cleanup the bb brigade, because buckets inserted to it can be created from
scpool and this pool can be freed before this brigade.
POSSIBLE (but as yet unconfirmed) fix for crashes seen with threaded servers,

author: jkaluza
msg: mod_ssl: Add -t -DDUMP_CA_CERTS option which dumps the filenames of all
configured SSL CA certificates to stdout the same way as DUMP_CERTS does.

author: anoopsamjohn
msg: HBASE-5349 Automagically tweak global memstore and block cache sizes based on workload
